name: DialysisEducation
title: Dialysis Education
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent patients received dialysis education.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Intervention, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with patients who had dialysis education. This includes only relevant concepts associated with education at home.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
